work.title: Bar Support Staff
work.description: My role as part of the bar support team was to maintain the whisky bar, dancefloor, bin room, mezzanine and outside smoking area. Some of the responsibilities I had were as follows: collecting glasses, changing bins, maintaining the bin rooms, cleaning up spillages, answering and receiving radio calls.

projects.category: Tianbing tattooed deep v meditation +1 pinterest, health goth kogi. Pour-over green juice flexitarian iceland XOXO ennui affogato enamel pin listicle. Small batch +1 portland sustainable deep v adaptogen mumblecore everyday carry

projects.title: Financial Planning Application
projects.category: ianbing tattooed deep v meditation +1 pinterest, health goth kogi. Pour-over green juice flexitarian iceland XOXO ennui affogato enamel pin listicle. Small batch +1 portland sustainable deep v adaptogen mumblecore everyday carry

projects.title: Financial Planning Application API
projects.category: The Financial Planning Application API was developed for Webbiz. The API connects to a Mongo database which the API recieves data from. Financial Planning Application manages the data and emails for the Financial Planning Application.

projects.title: Theatre Seats Planner
projects.category: The purpose of this program is to demonstrate how ArrayList interface works. The program allows seats to be reserved or canceled. The program also prints out the reserved seats.

projects.title: Trip Planner
projects.category: The purpose of this  program is to demonstrate how Linked List interface works. The program that reads in a list of cities from a file, and allows users to go to the next city in the list, the previous city or print the list of cities.

projects.title: Grocery List
projects.category: A Grocery List program that allows user's to add an item to the grocery list, modify items in the grocery list, remove items from the grocery list, search for items in the grocery list and print out the contents of the grocery list.

projects.title: Movies Domestic Gross By Genre Analysis
projects.category: Using the Python Seaborn Library to show Domestic Gross by Genre on a box plot graph.

projects.title: Movie Ratings Analysis
projects.category: Using the Python Seaborn Library to show the distributions of the audience and critic ratings. Using a facet grid to display a violin plot that plots the movies budget against the year of creation, a kde plot which plots the relationdship between critic and audience ratings.

projects.title: World Trends Analysis
projects.category: Using the Python Seaborn and Pandas Libraries to show plot the BirthRate against LifeExpectancy categorized by Country Region in 1960 and 2013, BirthRate against Internet Users categorized by Income Group and Country's Region

projects.title: Basketball Statistics Analysis
projects.category: Using Python to analyse basketball players preformance from 2005-2014, Some of the elements analysed are the overall players points scored per season,the saleries of the player per season, points scored per season, amount of free throws by players, the players free throw accuracy, players throw accuracy etc.

projects.title: JSX to React Compiler
projects.category: A React Single Page Application that transpiles ecmascript 2016 code to compiled react code live in the browser.

projects.title: Financial Statement Analysis
projects.category: Using Python to analyse a companies profit, profit after tax,profit, good months, bad months, best month worst month, mean and profit margin in a given year by using its revenue and expenses.

projects.title: React Weather Application
projects.category: A dynamic web application that can tell users the weather forecast in Ireland for the next five days. This application is developed in React and Redux that uses the open weather API.

projects.title: Law of the Large Numbers
projects.category: A Python program that proves the Law of the Large Numbers theorem. The user chooses the sample size of randomly normally distributed numbers for the program to prove the theorem based on these numbers generated.

projects.title: Binary Adder
projects.category: A JavaScript program that adds two binary numbers together using only logic gates (the and, or and not operators) then presenting the, in the format of 0010 0011.

projects.title: Moatview Early Education Centre
projects.category: moatvieweec.com was developed for the purpose of Webmas 2016 which is an event organised to support charitable causes by giving them an online presence. This website was developed by the team I was on.

projects.title: React Survey
projects.category: A single page survey application that asks users questions and posts the results to a database. This application is developed in React and Firebase.

projects.title: React Video Player
projects.category: A React Application that uses the YouTube search API that allows users to search and watch videos.

projects.title: Fibonacci Sequence
projects.category: A JavaScript program that displays the first x number of terms of the Fibonacci Sequence where x is chosen by the user.

projects.title: Hotel Rooms Maths Problem
projects.category: A maths problem where a customer to a hotel has lost their key. The room keys properties are the non-trivial divisors sum to a number greater than the room number and set of non-trivial divisors has no subset whose sum is equal to the room number.

projects.title: Input Event
projects.category: This is a boilerplate program that is used to have a web page respond when a certain sequence of keys is input. The program waits for the user to input a certain string of character. When the user inputs that string that string of characters they get an alert.

projects.title: Song Player
projects.category: This is a music player made in java that uses a websites Url for the song to be played the songs are stored in the songs.txt file and can be added into the program by using the application's interface or adding a song in manually in the format of Artist Name | Song Name | Song URL.

projects.title: Number Converter
projects.category: A program is written in Python, that can convert a decimal number to binary, hexadecimal or octal. This program can also convert a binary, hexadecimal or octal number into decimal.

projects.title: Veggie Guesser
projects.category: A command line interface vegetable guessing game that is made in python.

projects.title: Number Guessing Game
projects.category: This is command line interface numbers guessing game made in Python where users can choose whether or not the would like to range of the numbers to be guessed between. Users can also choose if they want to set a number of guesses.

projects.title: To-Do List
projects.category: A command line interface To-Do List Application made in Python.

projects.title: Individual Sites
projects.category: Individual Sites is My First Year Semester One Web Design Project for National College of Ireland.

projects.title: Ruby Rock Paper Scissors
projects.category: Rock Paper Scissors made with the ruby shoes GUI.

projects.title: Ruby Counting Words in a String
projects.category: Ruby program that counts a number of words in a string that excludes special characters and numbers.

It has survived not only five centuries, but also the leap into electronic typesetting, remaining essentially unchanged. It was popularised in the 1960s with the release of Letraset sheets containing Lorem Ipsum passages, and more recently with desktop publishing software like Aldus PageMaker including versions of Lorem Ipsum.
